API Reference¶

class matcher.jess_run.Match(hit: Hit, complete: bool = False, pairwise_distance: float = 0, index: int = 0)¶

Class for storing annotated Jess hits.

This class is a wrapper around pyjess.Hit and the original Template object that was used for the query.

property multimeric: bool¶

Boolean if the atoms in the hit stem from multiple protein chains

Type:

bool

property preserved_resid_order: bool¶

Boolean if the residues in the template and in the matched query structure have the same relative order. This is a good filtering parameter but excludes hits on examples of convergent evolution or circular permutations

Type:

bool

matcher
